text: - My name is Kristin Appleton
and I lead talent acquisition
for worldwide public sector,

business development and
strategic industries,
and strategic customer engagements.
When I started five years ago,
I had a team of eight recruiters
and over the last five years,
I have hired over 120 recruiters
to staff up a team.

There is not a more exciting
time, in my opinion,
to be part of AWS
and to be joining this company.
Not only are we in hypergrowth mode,

but we just introduced two
new leadership principles,
one of which I'm really excited about,
strive to be Earth's best employer.
So, continuing to be customer obsessed,
but now we're seeing a shift in addition
to be really employee obsessed.
So, a great time to join our team.
(upbeat music)
